heading: Filtering rows from a Table

explains.ExecuteReader(): This is used when we want to get a number of records back from a table. A SqlDataReader is returned
explains.SqlDataReader: An object that represents the table that was returned from our Query
explains.SqlDataReader.Read(): Causes our reader to advance down one row
explains.SqlDataReader.GetValue(): Used to access the data at a specific column on our current row

exampleDescription: In this example we use WHERE To filter our results based on a specific criteria and then print the results
